mapper.select: select seq, category_a, category_b, w_date, click, content, s_file, id, title from service_center WHERE SEQ = #{seq} and CATEGORY_a='공지사항'
mapper.update: UPDATE service_center SET click = click + 1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(SEQ) FROM service_center WHERE 1=1 and CATEGORY_a='공지사항'
AND SEQ > 0

select seq, prev, prev_title, next, next_title FROM ( SELECT SEQ, LAG(SEQ,1) OVER(ORDER BY SEQ) PREV, LAG(TITLE,1) OVER(ORDER BY SEQ) PREV_TITLE, LEAD(SEQ,1) OVER(ORDER BY SEQ) NEXT, LEAD(TITLE,1) OVER(ORDER BY SEQ) NEXT_TITLE FROM SERVICE_CENTER where CATEGORY_a='공지사항' ) WHERE SEQ= #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into service_center(SEQ, CATEGORY_A, CATEGORY_B, CONTENT, W_DATE, CLICK, S_FILE, ID, TITLE) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM service_center), #{category_a}, #{category_b}, #{content}, SYSDATE, '0', '파일없음', #{id}, #{title})
